column4: need some advice, just got a thinkpad and I need to decide between jaunty or karmic
also is there any difference between the minimal cd and installing server w/o any extra software?
I just want ubuntu w/o a gui
I don't want a gui Flannel
I have the server install and want to know if it will do the same thing
if I install the server without selecting any extra software will it be the same as the minimal w/o selecting additional software?
is having the server kernal going to alter my user experience though?
are you installing on a PPC?
there are lots of install options from alternate CD, just press tab key and run through them
when you get to yaboot prompt just press tab and review all your options - you don't need to install server stuff and then uninstall
you assume I'm using a mac. ;)
even on an intel, press tab and you will see lots of options - just keep pressing tab
I do own more macs than can be healthy but I'm just going to be using linux on my thinkpad I just got
my first laptop was a thinkpad - a whopping 166 Mhz :)
